node.statement: MSS CONVOLUTION FOR n=1: By the MSS formula, the finite free additive convolution p ⊞_1 q of p(x) = x - a and q(x) = x - b is the unique monic degree-1 polynomial whose coefficient c_1 satisfies c_1 = a_1 + b_1 where a_1 = -a and b_1 = -b (the negative of the roots). Thus r(x) = p ⊞_1 q(x) = x - (a + b), which has the single root a + b.
